Introduction

Welcome to CIPT Chero Increment Profits Tracker

CIPT Chero is a powerful tool designed for traders and scalpers who want to effectively manage and track their daily trading progress. Whether you're actively trading in the Forex market, cryptocurrencies, or stocks, CIPT Chero is here to help you achieve your financial goals through daily incremental profit tracking.

Who Can Use CIPT Chero?

CIPT Chero is ideal for:

  • Traders: Record your daily trades, analyze profits and losses, and improve your trading strategies.
  • Scalpers: Keep detailed records of quick trades to maximize small profit increments.
  • Day Traders: Monitor daily trading activities and track progress in real time.

Why Choose CIPT Chero?

  • Daily Tracking: Focuses on daily profit and loss tracking, perfect for active traders and scalpers.
  • Risk Assessment: Evaluate the risk of your daily trading plans and receive actionable advice.
  • Customizable Plans: Create and customize trading plans with daily profit targets.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Easy to navigate, making it simple for users of all experience levels to manage their daily trades.

Key Functions

  • Dashboard Overview: Get a quick view of your daily trading status, including total profits and losses.
  • Risk Assessment: Analyze the risk associated with your daily trading plans and receive suggestions for improvement.
  • Plan Creation: Design daily trading plans by setting initial balances, daily profit targets, and trading durations.
  • Order Entry: Log individual trades with details such as date, amount, and comments.
  • Detailed Reports: Generate comprehensive reports to review your daily trading activities and performance.

Support for Various Markets

CIPT Chero supports tracking and managing daily trading activities in various markets, including:

  • Forex: Monitor your foreign exchange trades and track daily profit/loss.
  • Cryptocurrency: Keep detailed records of your daily crypto trades.
  • Stock Market: Analyze your daily stock trading performance and evaluate risk.
  • Commodities: Track daily trades in commodities like gold, silver, and oil.

CIPT Chero is your trusted companion in daily trading, helping you to track progress, make informed decisions, and ultimately achieve your financial goals. Explore the features and start taking control of your daily trades today!

Developed for Convenience

  • Built with Microsoft Access and VBA: CIPT Chero is developed using Microsoft Access and VBA, ensuring a robust and reliable experience.
  • Offline Capability: The application works entirely offline, with no need for third-party services or online connectivity.
  • Free for a Limited Time: Enjoy all the features of CIPT Chero for free during our limited-time offer || Download Here ||
